page.title: 19OUR PETS
page.content: WE HAVE FOUR PETS IN ALL.WE HAVE A FISH AND THREE GUINEA PIGS.THE FISH IS CALLED 'FEARLESS FRED'.WE DID HAVE THREE FISH,TWO FAN-TAILS AND A GOLDFISH.THE GOLDFISH WAS THE ONLY ONE TO SURVIVE AND THAT'S WHY WE CALLED HIM 'FEARLESS FRED'.HE MIGHT BE LONELY BECAUSE HE HAS BEEN ALONE FOR A LONG TIME NOW.WE CLEAN HIM OUT ONCE A WEEK. WE FEED FRED EVERY NIGHT WITH FLAKEY PIECES OF FISH FOOD. OUR GUINEA PIGS ARE CALLED JEMMA,PETAL AND TOFFEEKINS.THEY ALL HAVE SOFT SHINY FUR.ONCE TOFFEEKINS RAN AWAY.WE TRY TO TAKE THE M OUT EVERY DAY AND NIGHT.WE FEED THEM EACH NIGHT AND CLEAN THEM OUT ONCE A WEEK AND GIVE THEM CLEAN BEDDING.THEY SCRATCH A LOT AND THEY AREN'T VERY EASY TO CATCH EITHER.
